product_name: Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Featuring ultrasoft fabric, the simple, functional and attractive Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Tank Top for women provides cool, dry comfort during your rides and workouts. Polyester/elastane blend fabric is powered by Ice-fil(R), providing superior skin cooling and moisture management when you perspire. 2 back pockets stash ride essentials. Adjustable inner support liner lets you customize the fit. The Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Tank Top for women has reflective elements to keep you visible in low light.
short_description: Featuring ultrasoft fabric, the simple, functional and attractive Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Tank Top for women provides cool, dry comfort during your rides and workouts.
